name: Possessed (itch) (Ultra Rush, Relapse21, Sehri, AmmaraMalik, Jimberrydev, Dash Matrix)
name_original: Possessed (itch) (Ultra Rush, Relapse21, Sehri, AmmaraMalik, Jimberrydev, Dash Matrix)
description:
TW PSHYCHOLOGICAL HORROR-GAME

Stevie is lost. He's in his basement, he doesn't know what he's doing there or why his house isn't the way it used to be. He wanders the halls looking for his wife Aana and his son Charles. Everything is different and seems unfamiliar.

WASD for move, E for use

This game was made and published for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 (Link here) Participants:
  • Programmer lead/ Game design - Ultra Rush
  • 3D Artist/Design/Textures/Lights Works and Debug - JimberryDev
  • 3D Artist: Building/Textures - Dash Matrix
  • 3D Artist: Characters/Animations -Ammara Malik
  • Sound Designer - RelapseX21
  • Narrative Designer - Sehrish
